title: MeCart
description: A fully responsive online store designed for seamless shopping across devices, featuring integrated payment systems for secure and hassle-free transactions. It offers a sleek, user-friendly interface with customizable product listings and real-time order tracking..

title: Fundify-innovation
description: A modern crowdfunding web app built with React.js, empowering startup founders to showcase their ideas, raise funds securely, and connect with a supportive community. The platform features real-time funding progress, user-friendly dashboards, and social sharing to maximize visibility..

title: Portfolio Website
description: A sleek and responsive portfolio showcasing the skills and projects of a Full-Stack Developer. It features interactive sections for expertise, live project demos, GitHub integrations, and contact details, designed to leave a lasting impression..

title: Social Media Dashboard
description: A comprehensive dashboard for managing multiple social media accounts.

title: Movies-database And Search
description: The Movies Database and Search Web App is a platform that allows users to search and explore movies easily.
